title: Tools to Become Digitally Sovereign
content:
Since 2016, DataEthics.eu has kept a list of alternative tools to Big Techâ€™s. In 2025, digital sovereignity has become a necessity, and therefore we encourage everybody to dive into the list and start the process of getting control of your own data and help the European tech industry grow.

How to get started? Start with the easy ones. Change browser. Search engine. Translator. Chatbot. There are great alternatives to all of them.

If you need more info or want to book a talk or workshop, do send en email to info@dataethics.eu
